name: Samurai Slash
description:
When you see the  SLASH! appear, attack the computer.

Mobile: Shake phone to attack

Desktop: Spacebar to attack.

You lose/Score resets when computer successfully attacks you first.

You get a penalty for attacking too early.

Your character will be on the right.

The red flashes mean the computer won/ attacked first. (Score will reset)

White flashed mean you attacked first/ you have won the match. (Score will go up by 1 point)

Made for Game Makers Tool Kit Game Jam 2019.
Game Jam Theme: "Only One"
